DOC.detailed_description: CY 4031 multi-national , double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled , stratified , parallel group study patient ALS selective fast skeletal muscle troponin activator , tirasemtiv . The study include three phase ; open-label phase ( 2 week ) , double-blind , placebo-controlled phase ( 48 week ) , double-blind , placebo-controlled tirasemtiv withdrawal phase ( 4 week ) . Patients complete two week treatment open-label tirasemtiv ( 125 mg twice daily ) randomize 3:2:2:2 placebo three different dose level tirasemtiv . Approximately 600 patient enrol onto open-label treatment . Patients enter study riluzole 50 mg twice daily continue riluzole reduce dose 50 mg daily .
